original_prompt:
autopilot: lets make some changes to the android app.
1. remove the logon page, the app should just open. have something in the settings page that allows users to
connect to a backend, but its not really required for just the app to work by itself.
2. i think there is somethign wrong with the Maintenance section. I have something on the schedule, but i have no
items in the upcoming section.
3. can we just completely redo the Maintenance page here? this does work i just think we can do something better.
